directions: Place cream cheese, yogurt, pine nuts, basil and garlic in processor. Blend, using on/off turns, until combined. Add feta cheese and sun-dried tomatoes and blend, using on/off turns, until combined but still chunky. Transfer spread to bowl. (Feta-pine nut spread can be made 3 days ahead. Cover and refrigerate.)
ingredients: 1/3 cup chopped drained oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes
title: Feta-Pine Nut Spread
